Title: Establishes procedures to disassemble and dispose of guns purchased by local municipalities and law enforcement agencies through a gun buyback program
Summary: Establishes procedures to disassemble and dispose of guns, rifles and firearms purchased by local municipalities and law enforcement agencies through a gun buyback program, including the creation of a log and video recordings.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring the disposal of firearms acquired pursuant to a gun buyback program
